solutions.descriptionText: My name is Giorno Venturi. A gifted artist celebrated far and wide. I've created countless masterpieces that were meant to stand the test of time. Now they are nothing more than ash and cinder.
The culmination of my works, so close to perfection... Perfection is a cruel stranger, always out of reach. They're always yearning for something more, something divine, something unattainable.
Ah, my sacred sanctum! Where I created my last artwork, painted with luminescent paints I created myself! A never-diminishing, eternal glow, destined to last through centuries untold.

This lantern will eventually fall from the ceilling and set the entire studio ablaze. I will stand, soulless, and let the flames consume me whole as I watch my memory burn to ashes, the ashes of my dreams.

I had been consumed by my work far before the flames. I was always yearning for something more, something divine, something unattainable. The flames melted off the shackles of my ambition, freeing me.
